analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: “Sampannasīlā, bhikkhave, viharatha sampannapātimokkhā; pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvutā viharatha ācāragocarasampannā aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvino; samādāya sikkhatha sikkhāpadesu.
analyzed: sampanna sīlāḥ bhikkhave viharatha sampanna pātimokkhāḥ pātimokkha savara savutāḥ viharatha ācāra gocara sampannāḥ aṇumattesu vajjesu bhaya dassāvinaḥ samādāya sikkhatha sikkhāpadesu

original: Sampannasīlānaṁ vo, bhikkhave, viharataṁ sampannapātimokkhānaṁ pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvutānaṁ
analyzed: sampanna sīlānam vaḥ bhikkhave viharatam sampanna pātimokkhānam pātimokkha savara savutāna

original: viharataṁ ācāragocarasampannānaṁ aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvīnaṁ samādāya sikkhataṁ
analyzed: viharatam ācāra gocara sampannānam aṇumattesu vajjesu bhaya dassāvīnam samādāya sikkhata

original: Carato cepi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno abhijjhā, byāpādo vigato hoti, thinamiddhaṁ vigataṁ
analyzed: carataḥ ce pi bhikkhave bhikkhunaḥ abhijjhā byāpādaḥ vigataḥ hoti thinamiddham vigata

original: hoti, uddhaccakukkuccaṁ vigataṁ hoti, vicikicchā pahīnā hoti, āraddhaṁ hoti vīriyaṁ
analyzed: hoti uddhacca kukkuccam vigatam hoti vicikicchā pahīnā hoti āraddham hoti

original: asallīnaṁ, upaṭṭhitā sati asammuṭṭhā, passaddho kāyo asāraddho, samāhitaṁ cittaṁ ekaggaṁ.
analyzed: a sallīna upaṭṭhitā sati a sammuṭṭhā passaddhaḥ kāyaḥ a sāraddhaḥ samāhitam cittam ekagga

original: Carampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁbhūto ātāpī ottāpī satataṁ samitaṁ āraddhavīriyo pahitattoti vuccati.
analyzed: caram pi bhikkhave bhikkhu evabhūtaḥ ātāpī ottāpī satatam samitam āraddha vīriyaḥ pahitatto ti vuccati

original: Ṭhitassa cepi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno abhijjhā byāpādo vigato hoti …pe… thinamiddhaṁ
analyzed: ṭhitassa ce pi bhikkhave bhikkhuno abhijjhā byāpādaḥ vigataḥ hoti pe thinamiddha

original: … uddhaccakukkuccaṁ … vicikicchā pahīnā hoti, āraddhaṁ hoti vīriyaṁ asallīnaṁ, upaṭṭhitā
analyzed: uddhacca kukkuccam vicikicchā pahīnā hoti āraddham hoti vīriyam asallīnaḥ upaṭṭhitā

original: sati asammuṭṭhā, passaddho kāyo asāraddho, samāhitaṁ cittaṁ ekaggaṁ.
analyzed: sati asammuṭṭhā passaddhaḥ kāyaḥ asāraddhaḥ samāhitam cittam ekagga

original: Ṭhitopi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁbhūto ātāpī ottāpī satataṁ samitaṁ āraddhavīriyo pahitattoti vuccati.
analyzed: ṭhitaḥ api bhikkhave bhikkhu evabhūtaḥ ātāpī ottāpī satatam samitam āraddha vīriyaḥ pahita ttaḥ ti vuccati

original: Nisinnassa cepi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno abhijjhā byāpādo vigato hoti …pe… thinamiddhaṁ
analyzed: nisinnassa ce pi bhikkhave bhikkhuno abhijjhā byāpādaḥ vigataḥ hoti pe thinamiddha

original: … uddhaccakukkuccaṁ … vicikicchā pahīnā hoti, āraddhaṁ hoti vīriyaṁ asallīnaṁ, upaṭṭhitā
analyzed: uddhacca kukkuccam vicikicchā pahīnā hoti āraddham hoti vīriyam asallīnaḥ upaṭṭhitā

original: sati asammuṭṭhā, passaddho kāyo asāraddho, samāhitaṁ cittaṁ ekaggaṁ.
analyzed: sati asammuṭṭhā passaddhaḥ kāyaḥ asāraddhaḥ samāhitam cittam ekagga

original: Nisinnopi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁbhūto ātāpī ottāpī satataṁ samitaṁ āraddhavīriyo pahitattoti vuccati.
analyzed: nisinnaḥ api bhikkhave bhikkhu evabhūtaḥ ātāpī ottāpī satatam samitam āraddha vīriyaḥ pahita ttaḥ ti vuccati

original: Sayānassa cepi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno jāgarassa abhijjhā byāpādo vigato hoti …pe…
analyzed: sa yānassa ce pi bhikkhave bhikkhuno jāgarassa abhijjhā byāpādaḥ vigataḥ hoti pe

original: thinamiddhaṁ … uddhaccakukkuccaṁ … vicikicchā pahīnā hoti, āraddhaṁ hoti vīriyaṁ
analyzed: thinam iddham uddhacca kukkuccam vicikicchā pahīnā hoti āraddham hoti

original: asallīnaṁ, upaṭṭhitā sati asammuṭṭhā, passaddho kāyo asāraddho, samāhitaṁ cittaṁ ekaggaṁ.
analyzed: a sallīna upaṭṭhitā sati a sammuṭṭhā passaddhaḥ kāyaḥ a sāraddhaḥ samāhitam cittam ekagga

original: Sayānopi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu jāgaro evaṁbhūto ātāpī ottāpī satataṁ samitaṁ āraddhavīriyo pahitattoti vuccatī”ti.
analyzed: sa yānaḥ api bhikkhave bhikkhu jāgaraḥ evabhūtaḥ ātāpī ottāpī satatam samitam āraddha vīriyaḥ pahita ttaḥ ti vuccati iti

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
